ack.p: We thank all the staff members working for the research project for SFTS in Japan, especially, Dr. Hideki Tani, Dr. Masayuki Shimojima, Dr. Takeshi Kurosu, Dr. Tomoki Yoshikawa, Dr. Hirofumi Kato, Dr. Masaaki Satoh, Department of Virology 1, National Institute of Infectious Diseases, Tokyo, Japan. The present affiliate of Dr. Hideki Tani is the Department of Virology, Graduate School of Medicine and Pharmaceutical Sciences, University of Toyama, Toyama, Japan.
